dcterms:description: Youtube-VOS is the first large-scale video segmentation dataset consisting of 4453 high quality hand labeled videos, split across training, validation, and test sets. It provides the ground-truth segmentation for the first frame in any set, following a one-shot formulation.
dcterms:title: Youtube-VOS

dcterms:creator: J. Pont-Tuset

A. Sorkine-Hornung
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: DAVIS-17 is a densely annotated video object segmentation dataset consisting of 60 high quality videos for training and 30 for validation. It evaluates Jaccard and F-measure without distinguishing between seen and unseen categories.
dcterms:title: DAVIS-17
